persistence

Interface Database

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AnalyticStorageOnLevelDb, AnalyticStorageOnMongoDb, AnalyzerOnMongoDb, LevelDbDatabase, MongoDbDatabase, Neo4jDbDatabase, PokemonManagerOnMongoDb, TeamManagerOnNeo4j

    public interface Database
    Shared interface among Databases, defines remote connections and structures of basic CRUD operations

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      closes the connection with the remote Database

    • Method Detail

      • startConnection

        void startConnection()
        starts the connection with the remote Database

      • closeConnection

        void closeConnection()
        closes the connection with the remote Database

      • insert

        boolean insert(java.lang.Object toInsert)
        insert 1 object into the database
        Parameters:
        toInsert - ArrayList of arbitrary objects to insert into the Database
        Returns:
        true if exactly one element has been added

      • remove

        boolean remove(java.lang.Object o)
        remove 1 ore more objects from the database
        Parameters:
        o - is an Object to remove or a query to submit
        Returns:
        true if at least one element has been removed

      • getAll

        java.lang.Object getAll()
        gets all the elements
        Returns:
        a list of retrieved elements

      • getWithFilter

        java.lang.Object getWithFilter(java.lang.Object filter)
        Parameters:
        filter - query or filter to submit to the db
        Returns:
        a list of retrieved elements

      • update

        boolean update(java.lang.Object target,
               java.lang.Object newValue)
        Parameters:
        target - query or object to update
        newValue - new value for the target
        Returns:
        true if at least one object is updated
